numbered_ace_sentences: 2. In practically every country, the percentage of younger generations is more significant than the percentage of over-40-year-olds.
5. The younger generation is more optimistic about its future than previous generations.
6. I wonder about a possible cause.
7. This fact might be due to prejudice of both groups towards themselves.
8. Within their age group, younger individuals are more confident.
10. Older adults feel that they are better at controlling the world.
11. This fact relates to my community.
12. My community is around these regions.
13. A title could be "Optimistic generations of young adults".
